responses: Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: How much is the tuition fee?
Is it required to pay full tuition per sem?
Do you do installment on tuition fees?
responses: The tuition is around P30-40k per term, and we offer installment and full payment methods are offered as payment terms.

patterns: What is the Address of the school?
What is the address of Mapua
responses: Address: 658 Muralla St, Intramuros, Manila, 1002 Metro Manila
Our Office Hours starts 7:30 am to 4:30 pm (every day)

patterns: What are the requirements for enrollment
responses: Enrollment requirements for freshmen students can be found here: https://bit.ly/3abQT7j

patterns: What are the scholarships available for this particular program?

responses: Here are the scholarships available for your program are: E.T. Yuchengco Scholarship for Undergraduate, Don Tomas Mapúa Scholarship Academic Scholarship
Other Scholarship Programs Sponsored by Mapúa: Athletic Scholarship, FAMIT Scholarshi and MITLU Scholarship
